title: Did Betsy Davis say that schools could not plan a break - up from 19 yet to happen?
subtitle: The real statement of the United States Minister of Education came during an interview with CNN that went a little in circles.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In response to a question in an interview by CNN in July 2020 about what would happen if there was an outbreak of COVID-19 in schools, United States Secretary of Education Betsy Davis said: "You can't plan something that hasn't happened yet."
